reviews.review_msg: Carl's such a cool prof, his advice for us at the end of semester almost made me cry, it was sweet. Best thing about the class is his enthusiasm about the parasites, but he also cares about critical thinking. His questioning can be a bit intimidating, but if you take this class you'll learn to think outside the box & probly even be a better person!

One of the best profs I've had in a really long time. I've been up at SFU for 4 years now, and I'd put him in my top 3. Very involved in his field of research and passionate about what he teaches. It's a 9:30am class - which for me is early... but Carl always had my full attention, he made the class so interesting! I came into the class kinda appre
